description.value: You gain the benefit of the Poison Use class feature, with the following exception. You do not start with access to any poison recipes. When you gain a daily attack power, you can instead opt to learn a poison recipe. When you replace a daily attack power, you can instead replace one of your poison recipes with one of a higher level or with a daily attack power from your other hybrid class. The recipe's level must be less than or equal to your level. For each daily attack power you forgo, you can prepare one poison per day.
